mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, email, password, nickname, profile_image, provider_type, role_type) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{profileImage}, #{providerType}, #{roleType});
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, profile_image = #{profileImage}, provider_type = #{providerType}, role_type = #{roleType}, is_email_verified = #{isEmailVerified} WHERE user_id = #{userId};
